activities:
iGames manages the website located at www.pldx.com.  This is a community site supporting various communities such as lan centers, computer game enthusiasts, game publishers, etc. The site includes contests, forums, sweepstakes, videos and other relevant community generated or iGames provided content.  Users can register for a free account so they can participate in activities on the site.  There are no fees for any activities on the site.

iGames manages the website located at www.alienwarearena.com.  This site promotes PC gaming via Dell/Alienware computer systems.  The site includes contests, forums, sweepstakes, videos and other relevant PC gaming or computing content, supplied by iGames and/or users.  Users can register for a free account so they can participate in activities on the site.
